full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
====================================

### Catalogue Information

*   **Tender Title:** Desalter Kit, Sea Water
*   **Reference Number:** PW-22-01014014
*   **Solicitation Number:** W8485-237140/B

### General Information

*   **Publication Date:** 2022-11-18
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-02T14:00:00 (expired)
*   **Contracting Authority:** Department of National Defence

### Goods and Services Information

*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:** Participating in various Canadian free trade agreements (CKFTA, CCFTA, CFTA, Canada-Colombia FTA, Canada-Honduras FTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Worldwide
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

### Solicitation Documents

*   **Bid Solicitation Documents:** [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/18/c8a9999332aa9744f9da3c604627c46e/w8485-237140_b_bid_solicitation_en.pdf) [French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/18/1aa95e8a861124906e4d6f2d856f9e90/w8485-237140_b_bid_solicitation_fr.pdf)

### Request for Proposals

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for a desalter kit used for seawater, to be delivered to Canadian Forces Support Establishment (CFSE) Montreal and CFSE Edmonton. The vendors must indicate any proposed equivalent or substitute for the product and provide the brand name and model and/or part number and the NCAGE.

The bid should be submitted as soon as possible to allow sufficient time for evaluation. Note that bids transmitted electronically through epost Connect service may be more advisable due to COVID-19 impacts and reduced business hours.

The government reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on all matters.

### End User Entities

*   **End User Entities Name:** Department of National Defence
*   **End User Entities Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2, Canada
